plot: Asahi Kuromine has a crush on a cute girl named Yōko Shiragami. Shiragami just happens to be a vampire. Asahi cannot keep a secret, but he is determined to keep Shiragami's secret anyways.
opening_theme: "Himitsu o Chōdai" (ひみつをちょーだい) by Ars Magna
ending_theme: "Ienai Ienai" (言えない言えない) by hilcrchyme
